name: Newari Khaja Set
desc: A traditional Newari dish in Nepal. which includes beaten rice, mixed achar, chhoila. batta sadeko and fried egg.

name: Nepalese Thali Set
desc: Traditional Nepalese Dinner Daal - Bhat - Tarkari (Nepali is eaten throughout Nepal, Daal is a soup made of lentils and spices, served over boiled grain, Bhat - usally rice but sometimes another vegetable curry, tarkari.
